text: Kelly Flynn (October 4, 1954 â€“ March 3, 2021) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the Montana House of Representatives from 2011 to 2019.Profile, votesmart.org; accessed April 28, 2015. Kelly was born in Townsend, Montana. Flynn died of kidney and lung cancer on March 3, 2021, in Helena, Montana at age 66. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Deaths from kidney cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Montana Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Montana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Kelly Flynn
